rm sentence in last paragraph in lead section which was not cited

lead section: came from ==>was influenced by
Moved recently added information in the lead section to Oneness theology. Removed information on the ICOF in Denominations and adherents as the source proveded did not mention 11 million members.

added Charismatics in sentence in lead section
/* History to 1900 */ This addition, from earlier today, by an anon-IP and uncited, doesn't feel right. Reverting. The onus is on information provide to cite reliable sources.
"History" was very long and deeply nested. Split into pre-Azusa and post-Azusa sections.
/* Azusa Street to present */ Azusa already wikilinked a few times.
/* Europe */ Remove unnecessary repetition, which also improves consistency across subsections. Minor copyedit.
/* North America */ Remove unnecessary repetition. Also improves consistency with other subsections. Request citations.
/* History */ Copyedit. The "120" was the number at the choosing of Judas' replacement, not necessarily (although likely) the number at Pentecost.
/* Spiritual gifts */ Merge glossolalia material into relevant section. Request citations for contents.
/* Theology */ Collect together (1) bible views (2) salvation views. (These had hitherto been split across different sections.)
/* Charismatic movement */ wikify indication of main article
/* See also */ Simplify and clarify a wikilink.
/* Armenia */ typo (I think; please verify and revert if necessary)
/* Armenia */ Typo, and unnecessary wikilink (already linked just above).
